txt.en: 'While performing the sombre task of cleaning Laerdan's chambers once and for all, I uncovered a note from Laerdan made out to you, [placeholder], along with a parcel that he left behind. Master Elrond bade me hold these items in my keeping in hopes that you would return.'
'My heart goes out to Laerdan, [placeholder]; his was a sad story. I know, as does he, that you did everything for him that you could.\n\n'This parcel is yours, as he wished it to be.'
'You should read the note from Laerdan I have given you, [placeholder].'
'You have played a major part in the war against Angmar, now we must turn our attention to the War against the Dark Lord.'
A parcel has been found addressed to you in Laerdan's old room.
'It is a sad duty I have....'
You should read Laerdan's note before opening the parcel he left for you.\n\nYou spoke to Failloth in Rivendell and learned that Laerdan had left a note and a parcel behind for you in his room.
Failloth is in the courtyard of the Last Homely House, in Rivendell.\n\nYou have read Laerdan's note and should speak now to Failloth.
